text: @SecPompeo @usembdenmark Wow, the deflection of the @realDonaldTrump is impossible to comprehend. They wasted 70 days or more playing down the virus costing 10's of thousands of lives. The US has 4% of the global population, but 25% of the deaths from #coronavirus worldwide. 🤔 think it might be related? https://t.co/8FqOUijXlz
